item.title: Tourists in Amsterdam - Part I
item.description: Being surprised by the incredible weather this weekend, we decided to walk around Amsterdam a bit, like any tourist would do. Here’s our journey from this Saturday, accompanied by photos and some explanations(TREASURE MAP), follow the pointers on the map to get an idea where the photos were taken: 1 Our starting point, close to Centraal Station, near the luxurious Amrath Hotel and its 7 Seas restaurant. Amazing pillow of clouds in the background, incredible weather for this end of September.
